name: For the salad greens Wash and spin dry the lettuce. Set aside.Hard-cooked goose eggs

steps.step: Place the eggs in a saucepan. Cover them with cold water. As soon as the water reaches a full boil, add 1/3 teaspoon of salt. Lower the heat to a simmer. Cook for about 7-8 minutes. Turn off the heat. Cover with a lid and let the quail eggs sit for about 10 minutes.

name: Transfer to an ice bath. Cool the eggs completely. Peel and cut them into quarters.Assembly time

steps.step: Place the greens on a serving platter.
Combine all the ingredients and distribute them evenly. Season with salt.
Drizzle with the vinaigrette when you're ready to serve.
Serve with lemon wedges on the side.Bon apptit!
